text.p: Portuguese first division Maritimo on Sunday accepted the resignation of their Brazilian coach Marinho Peres following the club's poor results this season, Maritimo president Rui Fontes said.
"Neither the coach nor the management were satisfied with the performance of the team, so his resignation was accepted," Fontes told reporters after the Madeira team lost 1-0 at home against Leca.
Maritimo, often a candidate for a place in the UEFA Cup, are 12th in the Portuguese first division, 14 points behind championship leader Porto.
Peres is the third managerial casualty of the season in the Portuguese first division. A replacement at Maritimo has yet to be named.
